job description:
We are seeking to expand our team by recruiting a Scientist with a background in immunology and molecular biology. The successful candidate will have a passion for driving high-impact projects focused on the development of novel immune-therapeutics. The successful candidate will effectively and routinely collaborate with colleagues on different projects and regularly present scientific results to multidisciplinary teams and leadership at SQZ Biotechnologies.

Primary responsibilities:
  • Generate and test engineered murine and human immune cells with the CellSqueeze platform
  • Design, produce, and validate cell-based assays in order to evaluate engineered immune cell function
  • Design and execute in vitro studies utilizing primary immune cells to characterize T cell responses
  • Mentor research associates
  • Contribute to experimental design and problem-solve in a creative manner
  • Manage and support external collaborations as a subject matter expert in immunology
  • Contribute to the external scientific visibility of the company through collaboration with large pharmaceutical companies

Candidate must:
  • Work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously
  • Demonstrate the ability to critically analyze and present data
  • Keep up-to-date with the literature related to his/her field
  • Demonstrate clear and professional verbal and written communication skills
  • Have strong work ethic and a team orientation
Required skills:
  • PhD in Immunology highly preferred, additional areas of applicable study include molecular biology, protein chemistry, and/or related fields
  • Expertise in the culture of primary human cells and in vitro assays such as ELISA, ELISpot, and intracellular cytokine staining
  • Hands-on experience with in vivo adoptive immune response assays in the context of tumor models is a plus
